t: Who Owns Amazon? Top Shareholders & Owners
s: Based on its 13F filed for the period ending Dec. 31, 2022, Vanguard Group owns 712.07 million shares of Amazon. This represents about 6.9% of all outstanding Amazon shares. Vanguard clients can invest in Amazon stock through the company's Consumer Discretionary ETF (VCR).
